renderpass.name: Image
Sound

renderpass.code:
#define P acos(-1.)
#define M(a) mod(time,a)
#define S(a) sin(P*a)

float sound( float time )
{
    float 
        t=M(.4)/.4,
        s=M(.2)/.2,
        u=M(.8)/.8,
        v=M(1.6)/1.6;
    return 
        S(80.*t)*exp(-3.*t)+
        S(S(1e3*s))*.1*exp(-1e1*s)+
        S(u*99.*floor(u*10.))*.3+
        S(v*2e3)*
        S(v*9e2)*exp(-v)*.2;
}
